EmailTemplate.subject: Corrected BlueWave Community Solar Bill
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!AccountName},
Please review this updated BlueWave Community Solar bill for payment.
We sent you a bill with a slight error previously, please ignore that statement as we have corrected the charges here. This statement reflects the solar net metering credits that you should see on your utility bill from {!Credits_Period}.
View the attachment in this email to see your statement.
To pay your bill, login to your BlueWave Customer Portal .
Would you recommend BlueWave to a friend?

Thanks for joining us to make 'Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality.
You can always give us a call at 844.786.4100 or email us at customercare@bluewavesolar.com
